text: Kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ pana bhikkhuniyā kārayamānāya pamāṇikā kāretabbā tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo
edit: Kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ pana bhikkhuniyā kārayamānāya pamāṇikā kāretabbā tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo

translations.transtext: 165. When a bhikkhunī is having a skin-eruption covering cloth made, it is to be made to the standard measurement. Here the standard is this: four spans — using the sugata span — in length, two spans in width.
